sample.comment: sanitize : check if there is only letters
sanitize : check if there is only numbers
sanitize : check if there is only letters and/or numbers
Uses an email_filter via filter_var function
Uses a full_special_chars_filter via filter_var function
Uses a magic_quotes_filter via filter_var function
Uses a number_float_filter via filter_var function
Uses a number_int_filter via filter_var function
Uses a special_chars_filter via filter_var function
Flushes content of $sanitized if the filter email_filter is not applied
Flushes content of $sanitized if the filter number_float_filter is not applied
Flushes content of $sanitized if the filter number_int_filter is not applied
sanitize : use of the function addslashes
sanitize : use of the function htmlentities. Sanitizes the query but has a high chance to produce unexpected results
sanitize : use of the function htmlspecialchars. Sanitizes the query but has a high chance to produce unexpected results
SANITIZE : use of preg_replace with another regex
SANITIZE : use in_array to check if $tainted is in the white list

SANITIZE : uses of ESAPI, an OWASP API
SANITIZE : use preg_replace to keep only char, number and _ ,\, -
SANITIZE : use str_replace to escape special chars -
